About Me

BIO

A recent graduate of the Computer Science degree at the University of Windsor with proven experience in IT as a student computer technician that is now looking for a position related to my field, which will allow me to grow my skills and advance my career.

St. Clair College

Student Computer Technician

From: 2015 to 2016

o Assisting students in the computer lab at the college with software.
  ▪ Software issues include Microsoft Word, PowerPoint and Excel.
o Assisting students with printer issues.
  ▪ Printers issues include logging errors, files errors etc.
o Shutting down the computer lab at closing.
